#summary How to install MaxTable servers on a cluster.

*HOW TO BUILD*<br>
  * Checkout the source code
  * cd your_source_dir
  * make all

*HOW TO RUN*<br>
  * cd your_source_dir
  * Edit the configure file
  * ./startMaster
  * ./startRanger

*RUN REGRESSION TESTS*<br>
  * Edit Makefile
  * ./startClient
